title: Betsy's Wrath
summaries: Betsy's Wrath is a Hardmode magic weapon which is dropped by Betsy during the Old One's Army event. Using the weapon fires 3 fireballs that arc through the air, exploding upon impact. Any enemies hit will receive the Betsy's Curse debuff for 10 seconds, lowering defense by 40. The debuff cannot be applied to other players.

statistics.Damage: 100 / 65 (Magic)
statistics.Sell: 5
